SEARCH
Package com.lboric.soccerdnd.entities

Class PlayerStatsEntity

java.lang.Object
com.lboric.soccerdnd.entities.PlayerStatsEntity
@Entity public class PlayerStatsEntity extends Object
Entity representing player statistics in the database.

This entity maps player statistics such as the number of goals scored in a specific season. It includes a reference to the associated PlayerEntity and maintains a unique constraint on the combination of player ID and season year to ensure one entry per player per season.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private Long id
      The unique identifier for the player statistics. This field is generated automatically and serves as the primary key in the database.

    • player

      private PlayerEntity player
      The player to whom these statistics belong. This relationship is a many-to-one association with the PlayerEntity. It uses the JoinColumn annotation to map the player ID to the corresponding foreign key.

    • seasonYear

      private int seasonYear
      The season year for which the statistics are recorded. Each player can have statistics for different seasons.

    • numberOfGoals

      private int numberOfGoals
      The number of goals scored by the player in the given season. This field represents the player's performance during the specific season.

      public PlayerStats toModel()
      Converts this PlayerStatsEntity to a PlayerStats model object.

      This method transforms the entity into a domain model object, which is typically used in the service layer or in data transfer objects (DTOs) for API communication.

      Returns:
      a PlayerStats object containing the data from this entity
